data.name: Star Vikings Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original rocking soundtrack for Star Vikings!

Includes 10 tracks from the game with extended duration and a special mix just for the OST.

Star Vikings - 01 - Star Vikings!
Star Vikings - 02 - This Ship Needs Pest Control
Star Vikings - 03 - Your Sliminess
Star Vikings - 04 - Viktorious Vikings
Star Vikings - 05 - We're Stranded
Star Vikings - 06 - Set Snail!
Star Vikings - 07 - Strange New Planet
Star Vikings - 08 - The Sacred Moon Temple
Star Vikings - 09 - Through The Fire And The Snails
Star Vikings - 10 - Ragnarok Is Upon Us
